Description: Papyrus; Hieratic administrative text(verso); Hieratic medical/magical text(recto). Recto contains 7 incantations to be used against snakes (only the first six of which survive in any legible form). Originally part of the same roll as EA 10309, although no direct join between the two now survives.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Thebes (historic - Upper Egypt) (Findspot determined by content.)
